reference_summary:
Too Faced x Kat Von D ~ Better Together Ultimate Eye Collection ~ Limited Edition
Too Faced
{'Brand': 'Too Faced', 'Special Feature': 'Travel size, Matte', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Coverage': 'Full', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.02 x 9.53 x 7.01 inches; 1.15 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'SG_B01MQZUUTB_US', 'UPC': '651986906291'}
I love this set!! A full sized liner, and a Too Faced Better than Sex full sized. The colors are gorgeous. Kats "devotion" is a highly pigmented black!! Great for lining as well...I have the whole collection, and I almost let this by , but the deal was great!!! Recommended!
Great Sex!! Great Value!!
Magic Rainbow Strobing Brush Rainbow Brush
Too Faced
{'Brand': 'Too Faced', 'Color': 'rainbow brush', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Item Weight': '0.13 Pounds'}
This brush is SO soft, and super pretty! The handle is an Irridecent purple with Too Faced written in Holographic print..Super good deal too! Get then before theyre gone!!
Super Nice!

Authentic, and Adorable!
Colourpop x Malibu Barbie Super Shock Highlighter "Beach Party" - Full Size, New in Box
Colourpop
['Colourpop x Malibu Barbie Super Shock Highlighter "Beach Party" - Full Size, New in Box']
{'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Coverage': 'Full', 'Brand': 'Colourpop', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '4.92 x 4.45 x 0.63 inches; 0.32 Ounces'}
These are HUGE! Had to get this to go with my palette! It's a peachy / gold, and arrived in pretty good shape... the pan, as  as the mirror is HUGE! It's really light weight too,  which is why I took off a star.. it was also slightly cracked on the edge,too, but I am going to use it, so that's fine... Great Formula! Amazing Brand!
Adorable!

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

**Preferences:**
- Continues to favor high-quality makeup products, particularly eye cosmetics, while actively exploring vibrant lip products.
- Enjoys collections that provide value, favoring full-sized items, and is receptive to trying new products like highlighters that complement existing palettes.
- Shows a strong affinity for vibrant, pigmented colors across all makeup categories, including bold shades for lips and eyes, and now also for limited-edition themed collections.
- Maintains a preference for respected cosmetic brands, valuing their quality and consistent positive experiences, particularly enjoying unique aesthetics in packaging and design.

**Patterns:**
- Remains enthusiastic about limited edition or special collaboration collections, showcasing an appreciation for unique items that resonate with their interests.
- Rates products positively, typically around 4 to 5 stars, as seen with recent purchases reflecting satisfaction despite minor issues.
- Actively engages in brand promotions and values deals, emphasizing a budget-conscious approach to cosmetics.
- Likely an informed consumer staying current with beauty trends and recommendations, expressing excitement about innovative product features and visuals.

Overall, this user is a dedicated makeup enthusiast focused on quality, value, and vibrant pigmentation across both eye and lip cosmetics, increasingly drawn to unique, themed collections that reflect personal interests, and embracing diverse formulations that enhance their collection.
